document.full_text: a u.s. official who oversees bankruptcies is seeking information about alternative plans to reorganize lehman brothers holdings inc  and pay roughly $60 billion to the bank's creditors.
document.title: u.s. seeks lehman details, creditors mull own plan
lines_and_colors: a u.s. official who oversees bankruptcies is seeking information about alternative plans to reorganize lehman brothers holdings inc  and pay roughly $60 billion to the bank's creditors.
